item.title: Louisiana to pay $9 million to man shot by state trooper during traffic stop

item.title: Portland, Oregon, to pay $3.75M to estate of unarmed man fatally shot by police
item.description: The city of Portland, Oregon, is set to pay $3.75 million to the estate of an unarmed man shot and killed by police in 2022

item.title: Former FBI and CIA Director William H. Webster dies at 101
